summary: This document is a financial transfer recap email detailing the movement of assets from JPMorgan Chase accounts to UBS accounts for Ghislaine Maxwell and several associated entities as of December 31, 2013. It shows the total banking and investment assets being transferred, amounting to over $14.6 million in total assets.

events.title: Asset Valuation for Transfer

events.title: Financial Transfer Recap Email Sent
events.description: Camille Garcia sends an email to Scott Stedman and Lyle Casriel recapping the transfer of financial assets for Ghislaine Maxwell and associated entities.

events.title: Forwarding of Financial Email
events.description: Scott Stackman forwards the 2014 financial transfer recap email to Paul S. Brown, Andrew-J Fleming, and Regina Keith.

keyFacts: As of December 31, 2013, Ghislaine Maxwell held significant assets being transferred from JPMorgan to UBS, with total assets valued at $14,688,453.98.

The transfer involved multiple accounts and entities linked to Maxwell, including personal accounts, the Max Foundation, 116 East 65th Street LLC, Pot and Kettle LLC, Ellmax LLC, TerraMar Project, Inc., and Max Hotel Services Corp.
Investment assets constituted the majority of the transfer, totaling $11,370,448.74, with banking assets at $3,318,005.24.
The document is a financial record forwarded in 2020, indicating ongoing interest or investigation into Maxwell's financial movements years after the original 2014 transfer.
